articles.title: Covid Live Updates: Global Cases, Vaccine Boosters and the Latest - The New York Times
articles.description: To drop its strategy of locking down whole cities like Shanghai over relatively small outbreaks is “not an option for China,” a top health official said. New cases are declining in many other Asian countries.
articles.content:

articles.title: 'I won't let this go': Cynthia Koh makes police report after Mercedes is vandalised - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The actress said there were “very long and deep scratches” on three panels of her car, and it had a punctured tyre, too.
articles.content:
Cynthia Koh had a very bad week last week when she found her red Mercedes damaged and vandalised in what appeared to be an intentional act.
